colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES 'DIS BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA'O, , BSDU NA,) CHE BA'I CHE MCHOG STON PA BLA NA MED, ,CHOS RJE NYI MA RGYAL BA'I BYIN RLABS KYIS, ,BDUD DANG BGEGS RIGS GNOD PA'I DGRA ZHI STE, ,RTAG TU DPAL GNAS NYIN MTSAN BKRA SHIS SHOG ,CHOS NYID BDEN PA'I CHOS MCHOG BLA NA MED, ,DAM CHOS BDUD RTZI BDEN PA'I BYIN RLABS KYIS, ,ZHES PA'I SKYON BRAL DGE TSOGS RNAM PAR 'PHEL, ,RTAG TU DPAL GNASx, ,DGE 'DUN YON TAN RIN CHEN DPAL 'BAR BA, ,RGYAL SRAS PHAN MDZAD BDEN PA'I BYIN RLABS KYIS, ,NYON MONGS SDUG BSNGAL GDUNG BA'I DGRA ZHI STE, ,RTAG TU DPAL GNASx, ,TSANGS DANG LHA DBANG SRUNG MA'I BYIN RLABS KYIS, ,@008A *, ,PHAN MDZAD LHA YI BKRA SHIS GNAS GYUR TE, ,BDE LEGS BSAM PA YID BZHIN 'GRUB PA DANG, ,TSE RING NAD MED BDE SKYID LDAN PAR SHOG (CES SHIS PA BRJOD CING ME TOG GTOR RO, ,'DI LTAR BGYIS PA'I RAB DKAR DGE BA'I MTHUS, ,BDAG SOGS MKHA' MNYAM MAR GYUR 'GRO RNAMS KYIS, ,SGRIB GNYIS BYANG ZHING TSOGS GNYIS RAB RDZOGS STE, ,BLA MED BYANG CHEN MYUR DU THOB GYUR CIG ,MI MDZOD CHOS SBYIN CHED DU PAR BSKRUN PA'I, ,RNAM DKAR MTHU LAS RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA DANG, ,KHYAD PAR RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSHAD SGRUB RNAMS, ,CHES CHER DAR ZHING YUN RING GNAS PAR SHOG ,(CES PA 'DI NI HAL HA JA SAG AUS DZING T'A CHING RTA MGRIN SKYABS KYI HO SHO NAS, DAD BRTZON DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS KUN RIG GI NGAG 'DON GYI TSIG GTZO BOR BYAS PA'I YONGS RDZOGS GI PAR GSAR BSKRUN BGYIS PA'I SMON TSIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SMIN GROL NO MIN HAN NGAG DBANG DBAN 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O, ,)(CES PA 'DI NI HAL HA JA SAG AUS DZING T'A CHING RTA MGRIN SKYABS KYI HO SHO NAS, DAD BRTZON DANG LDAN PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS KUN RIG GI NGAG 'DON GYI TSIG GTZO BOR BYAS PA'I YONGS DZA tA HI BAR GSAR BSKRUN BGYIS PA'I SMON TSIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SMIN GROL NO MIN HAN NGAG DBANG DBAN 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
